specimen_collector_sample_id.name: Sample ID
specimen_collector_sample_id.description: The specimen_collector_sample_identifier is a unique name or label assigned by the sample collector to each sample.

case_id.name: Case ID
case_id.description: The identifier used to specify an epidemiologically detected case of disease.

biosample_accession.name: BioSample Accession
biosample_accession.description: The identifier assigned to a BioSample. It ideally exists in a curated collection (e.g. stock centres, seed banks, DNA banks). The ID should have the following structure: name of the institution (institution code) followed by the collection code (if available) and the voucher id (institution_code:collection_code:vouche… Please note institution codes and collection codes are taken from a controlled vocabulary maintained by the INSDC: https://ftp.ncbi.nih.gov./pub/taxonomy/bi...

sequence_read_accession.name: Read Accession
sequence_read_accession.description: The sequence read accession is a repository identifier that links raw read data, methodological metadata, and quality control metrics. Repositories include those in the INSDC—the NCBI Sequence Read Archive (SRA), European Nucleotide Archive (ENA), and the DDBJ Sequence Read Archive (DRA), as well as repository(ies) from the CNCB/NGDC (China National Center for Bioinformation, National Genomics Data Center).

assembly_accession.name: Assembly Accession
assembly_accession.description: The versioned identifier assigned to an assembly or consensus sequence in  one of the International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration (INSDC) repositories, or China National Center for Bioinformation (CNCB), National Genomics Data Center (NGDC) repository.

sample_collected_by.name: Collected By
sample_collected_by.x-hint: Required field: select a value from the template list.
sample_collected_by.description: The name of the agency that collected the original sample.

other_sample_collected_by.name: Other Collected By
other_sample_collected_by.description: The name of the agency that collected the original sample.

sample_collection_date.name: Collection Date
sample_collection_date.x-hint: Required field: Date needs to be before the Sample Receive date. Only use YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g. 2025-10-29).
sample_collection_date.description: the date on which the sample was collected.

study_id.name: Study ID
study_id.description: A sequence of characters used to identify, name, or characterize the study.

study_site_id.name: Study Site ID
study_site_id.description: A sequence-of characters used to identify, name, or characterize the study site.

population.name: Population
population.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
population.description: A population is a collection of individuals from the same taxonomic class living, counted or sampled at a particular site or in a particular area.

enum: Human Population In Non Malarial Areas

purpose_of_sampling.name: Sampling Purpose
purpose_of_sampling.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
purpose_of_sampling.description: describes the reason that the sample was collected

enum: Surveillance Of International Border Crossing By Air Travel Or Ground Transport
Surveillance Of International Border Crossing By Air Travel
Surveillance Of International Border Crossing By Ground Transport

geo_loc_name_country.name: Country
geo_loc_name_country.x-hint: Required field: select a country from the template Country list.
geo_loc_name_country.description: country of origin of the sample

geo_loc_name_state_province_territory.name: Province
geo_loc_name_state_province_territory.x-hint: Required field: select a state from the template State list.
geo_loc_name_state_province_territory.description: describes the state, province, or territory of origin of the sample

anatomical_material.name: Anatomical Material
anatomical_material.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
anatomical_material.description: A substance obtained from an anatomical part of an organism e.g. tissue, blood.

other_anatomical_material.name: Other Anatomical Material
other_anatomical_material.description: A substance obtained from an anatomical part of an organism e.g. tissue, blood.

anatomical_part.name: Anatomical Part
anatomical_part.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
anatomical_part.description: An anatomical part of an organism e.g. oropharynx.

other_anatomical_part.name: Other Anatomical Part
other_anatomical_part.description: An anatomical part of an organism e.g. oropharynx.

body_product.name: Body Product
body_product.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
body_product.description: A substance excreted/secreted from an organism e.g. feces, urine, sweat.

other_body_product.name: Other Body Product
other_body_product.description: A substance excreted/secreted from an organism e.g. feces, urine, sweat.

environmental_material.name: Environmental Material
environmental_material.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
environmental_material.description: A data field which describes the substance obtained from the natural or man-made environment.

other_environmental_material.name: Other Environmental Material
other_environmental_material.description: A data field which describes the substance obtained from the natural or man-made environment.

diagnostic_procedure_of_malaria.name: Diagnostic Procedure
diagnostic_procedure_of_malaria.x-hint: Select one or more value from the template list.
diagnostic_procedure_of_malaria.description: A procedure used for the diagnosis of malaria, including the precise pathogen causing the disease.

other_diagnostic_procedure_of_malaria.name: Other Diagnostic Procedure
other_diagnostic_procedure_of_malaria.description: A data field which describes the substance obtained from the natural or man-made environment.

biospecimen_processing_date.name: Processing Date
biospecimen_processing_date.description: The date on which the sample was processed

isolate_id.name: Isolate ID
isolate_id.x-hint: Required field: needs to be unique value.
isolate_id.description: The user-defined identifier for the isolate, as provided by the laboratory that originally isolated the isolate.

genotype.name: Genotype
genotype.description: A genetic characteristics information that is about the genetic material of an organism and minimally includes information about the genetic background and can in addition contain information about specific alleles, genetic modifications, etc.

phenotype.name: Phenotype
phenotype.x-hint: Select one or more value from the template list.
phenotype.description: The assemblage of traits or outward appearance of an individual. It is the product of interactions between genes and the environment.

drug_resistance_type.name: Drug Resistance
drug_resistance_type.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
drug_resistance_type.description: A protective resistance that mitigates the damaging effects of a drug.

diagnostic_resistance_type.name: Diagnostic Resistance
diagnostic_resistance_type.x-hint: Select one or more value from the template list.
diagnostic_resistance_type.description: Diagnostic procedure of malaria associated to the diagnostic resistance.

host_subject_id.name: Subject ID
host_subject_id.description: A unique identifier by which each host can be referred to e.g. #131

host_scientific_name.name: Scientific Name
host_scientific_name.x-hint: Required field: select a value from the template list.
host_scientific_name.description: The taxonomic, or scientific name of the host.

other_host_scientific_name.name: Other Scientific Name
other_host_scientific_name.description: The taxonomic, or scientific name of the host.

host_age.name: Age
host_age.description: Age of host at the time of sampling.

host_age_unit.name: Age Unit
host_age_unit.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
host_age_unit.description: The units used to measure the host's age.

host_age_bin.name: Age Bin
host_age_bin.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
host_age_bin.description: The age category of the host at the time of sampling.

host_sex.name: Sex
host_sex.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
host_sex.description: A subject sex is the phenotypic sex of given subject (human or animal) related to a given investigation, study, and/or specimen.

other_host_sex.name: Other Sex
other_host_sex.description: A subject sex is the phenotypic sex of given subject (human or animal) related to a given investigation, study, and/or specimen.

host_health_state.name: Health State
host_health_state.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
host_health_state.description: Describes the health status of the host at the time of sample collection.

other_host_health_state.name: Other Health State
other_host_health_state.description: A subject sex is the phenotypic sex of given subject (human or animal) related to a given investigation, study, and/or specimen.

infectious_agent.name: Infectious Agent
infectious_agent.description: Any organism, such as a virus, parasite, or bacterium, that is capable of invading body tissues and multiplying.

host_disease.name: Disease
host_disease.x-hint: Required field: select a value from the template list.
host_disease.description: The name of the disease experienced by the host.

other_host_disease.name: Other Disease
other_host_disease.description: Further details pertaining to the health or disease status of the host at time of collection.

host_disease_stage.name: Disease Stage
host_disease_stage.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
host_disease_stage.description: Disease stage of host. A part of an occurrence of a disease process which is associated with position in the normal progression of the disease.

other_host_disease_stage.name: Other Disease Stage
other_host_disease_stage.description: Further details pertaining to the health or disease status of the host at time of collection.

host_health_outcome.name: Health Outcome
host_health_outcome.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.

host_residence_geo_loc_name_country.name: Residence Country
host_residence_geo_loc_name_country.x-hint: Select a country from the template Country list.
host_residence_geo_loc_name_country.description: The country where the host resides.

symptom_onset_date.name: Symptoms Begin
symptom_onset_date.description: The date on which the symptoms began or were first noted.

signs_and_symptoms.name: Symptoms
signs_and_symptoms.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
signs_and_symptoms.description: A perceived change in function or sensation, (loss, disturbance or appearance) indicative of a disease, reported by a patient.

enum: Jaundice (Yellowing Of The Eyes And Skin)

antimalarials.name: Antimalarials
antimalarials.x-hint: Select one or more value from the template list.
antimalarials.description: Agents used in the treatment of malaria.

host_vaccination_status.name: Vaccination Status
host_vaccination_status.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
host_vaccination_status.description: The vaccination status of the host (fully vaccinated, partially vaccinated, or not vaccinated).

vaccine_name.name: Vaccine Name
vaccine_name.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
vaccine_name.description: The name of the vaccine administered.

enum: R21/Matrix-M™, Serum Institute Of India Private Ltd (SII)

vaccination_history.name: Vaccination History
vaccination_history.description: A description of the vaccines received and the administration dates of a series of vaccinations against a specific disease or a set of diseases.

location_of_exposure_geo_loc_name_countr.name: Exposure Country
location_of_exposure_geo_loc_name_countr.x-hint: Select a country from the template Country list.
location_of_exposure_geo_loc_name_countr.description: The country where the host was likely exposed to the causative agent of the illness.

enum: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

travel_history.name: Travel History
travel_history.description: Travel history in last six months.

prior_malaria_infection_isolate_id.name: Infection Isolate
prior_malaria_infection_isolate_id.description: A data field that describes the identifier of the isolate found in the prior malaria infection.

prior_antibiotic_treatment_during_prior_.name: Treatment History
prior_antibiotic_treatment_during_prior_.description: Antiviral treatment for any infection during the prior malaria infection period.

prior_antimalarial_treatment_agent.name: Antimalarial Agent
prior_antimalarial_treatment_agent.x-hint: Select one or more value from the template list.
prior_antimalarial_treatment_agent.description: A data field which describes the name of the antiviral agent administered during the prior malaria infection.

sequenced_by.name: Sequencing Agency
sequenced_by.description: The name of the agency that generated the sequence.

purpose_of_sequencing.name: Sequencing Purpose
purpose_of_sequencing.x-hint: Required field: select a value from the template list.
purpose_of_sequencing.description: The reason that the sample was sequenced.

other_purpose_of_sequencing.name: Other Sequencing Purpose
other_purpose_of_sequencing.description: The reason that the sample was sequenced.

sequencing_date.name: Sequencing Date
sequencing_date.description: The date the sample was sequenced.

sequencing_assay_type.name: Sequencing Assay Type
sequencing_assay_type.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
sequencing_assay_type.description: The overarching sequencing methodology that was used to determine the sequence of a biomaterial.

other_sequencing_assay_type.name: Other Sequencing Assay Type
other_sequencing_assay_type.description: The reason that the sample was sequenced.

sequencing_instrument.name: Sequencing Instrument
sequencing_instrument.x-hint: Required field: select a value from the template list.
sequencing_instrument.description: The model of the sequencing instrument used.

other_sequencing_instrument.name: Other Sequencing Instrument
other_sequencing_instrument.description: The model of the sequencing instrument used.

breadth_of_coverage_value.name: Coverage Breadth
breadth_of_coverage_value.description: The percentage of the reference genome covered by the sequenced data, to a prescribed depth.

depth_of_coverage_value.name: Coverage Depth
depth_of_coverage_value.description: The average number of sequencing reads representing a given nucleotide in the reconstructed sequence.

reference_genome_accession.name: Reference Accession
reference_genome_accession.description: A persistent, unique identifier of a genome database entry.

bioinformatics_protocol.name: Bioinformatics Protocol
bioinformatics_protocol.description: The name and version number of the bioinformatics protocol used.

virulence_factor_gene.name: Virulence Factor
virulence_factor_gene.description: A persistent, unique identifier of a genome database entry.

resistance_gene_symbol.name: Gene Symbol
resistance_gene_symbol.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
resistance_gene_symbol.description: A persistent, unique identifier of a genome database entry.

resistance_variant.name: Resistance Variant
resistance_variant.x-hint: Select a value from the template list.
resistance_variant.description: The overarching sequencing methodology that was used to determine the sequence of a biomaterial.

enum: PLDH Genes Variation Or Their Protein Expression
ALDOLASE Genes Variation Or Their Protein Expression
Cuticular Protein Genes Linked To Structural Changes

other_resistance_variant.name: Other Resistance Variant
other_resistance_variant.description: The reason that the sample was sequenced.

lineage_clade_name.name: Lineage Name
lineage_clade_name.description: A data field which describes the name of the lineage or clade. Example Guidance: Provide the Pangolin or Nextstrain lineage/clade name.
